dmca.title: [ABUSE] Website Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Loquax [mailto:jason@loquax.co.uk] 
Sent: Thursday, January 20, 2005 12:21 PM
To: Andrea
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [ABUSE] Website Copyright Infringement

Dear Andrea

Thank you for your time explaining the situation.

Complaint is as follows.

1. Complaining party: Jason Dale, managing director of Loquax Ltd, 19 Coed
Fedwen, 
Birchgrove, Swansea, UK

2. Infringed work is at http://www.loquax.co.uk/http://www.loquax.com and
subsequent 
pages linked therein. 

e.g
http://www.loquax.com
http://www.loquax.co.uk/competitions/

3. Infringing website is http://www.letmefree.com - all content relating to
Loquax and 
content taken from our servers should be disabled and removed immediately.

examples
http://www.letmefree.com
http://www.letmefree.com/competitions/competitions.html
http://www.letmefree.com/community/community.html
http://www.letmefree.com/offlinecomps/offlinecomps.html

and all other subsequent pages on the letmefree domain.

4. I can be contacted at jason@loquax.co.uk, and via phone on UK number
01792 
701303. My UK address is Jason Dale, 19 Coed Fedwen, Birchgrove, Swansea,
SA7 
0HA, UK

5. I have good faith and belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not 
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. As managing director of Loquax Ltd I am authorized to act as complainant
and the 
information in the notification is accurate.

I hope that this meets with the necessary approval for action to be taken.

Kind Regards

Jason Dale
--
Loquax Ltd
http://www.loquax.co.uk
